SYNOPSIS:- Pathlaag (1964) Marathi
BALASAHEB PAANSE, an eminent lawyer is hurriedly summoned back from his trip Abroad, as his wife ASHA is critical. Balasaheb arrives, but it is too late as Asha has, Breathed her last. A shockeed Balasaheb, is devastated as his whole world has collapsed In his face. In his grief stricken moment, he gets a visit from Inspector Salvi, who tells Him that there is a woman in his custody who claims to be Balasahebs wife Asha. Not only does she look every inch like Asha, but she also knows all the details about Their house as well as the people living there. In a private chat with Balasaheb she Reveals to him the innermost secrets about their wedded life which only he and Asha Knew. A riveting physcological dramatic thriller, full of twistsand turns that grips you from the word go. Deft direction, Superlative performances and lilting music, make this a must watch.
